bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Definition of "telecommunications" for purposes of the Act
bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purposes of the Act, telecommunications includes land and improvements used or held for the purposes of, or for purposes ancillary to, the business of a telecommunications common carrier that operates a telephone system, data telecommunications network or cable television undertaking, but does not include land and improvements in respect of a telecommunications common carrier that is a radio or television broadcasting or rebroadcasting undertaking.
